website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to all-night comfort, few wrist braces come close to this one. Choose it if you need extra nighttime support that won't interfere with sleep.
pros: A supportive metal splint encased in soft cushioned beads provides maximum stability and supreme comfort that’s perfect for nighttime use
Extended length further limits movement while sleeping
Breathable materials prevent sweating and irritation
cons: May be too restrictive for daytime use

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: All the 5 star reviews must be fake. I got 2 of these , and I noticed that little white beads were falling out into my hand. I looked, and the sowing job was awful on this thing. I wish I saw earlier because I used these last night, and now my bed is covered in the little white beads! Cheap crap with a bunch of fake reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Z

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this brace!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first brace I’ve tried. My carpel tunnel symptoms include: tingling, numbness, soreness. Before I started wearing this brace at night while I sleep, I would wake up from the tingling. This brace has completely eliminated that. I had no problem getting used to sleeping in it, it’s very comfortable. The material is breathable yet durable and straps are easily adjustable, even in the dark. The beads on the inside are so awesome because they mold to my palm and cradle my hand and wrist perfectly. I highly recommend this brace!
customer_reviews.author: MF2007

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible, useless, over-priced brace
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal tunnel syndrome. This brace is too big to use during the day because the beads get in the way: I literally cannot hold a mouse with it on. It is useless at night because the rigid piece is only on one side so it is no good for immobilizing your wrist overnight. This is both ridiculously overpriced and also useless. Don't buy this brace unless you just intend for it to sit in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Works well for carpal tunnel!!
customer_reviews.text: My symptoms are undiagnosed, but I'm pretty certain that I have carpal tunnel. I've been experiencing numbness and tingling in my hands, fingers, and arms, and the symptoms are especially worse at night. This brace has made a huge difference. It's so soft and comfortable! The additional bean bag feature is soft and molds the shape of my hand, and I don't even notice I have the brace on when I sleep. From wearing this brace, I have minimal pain during the day. I highly recommend this Comfy Brace for anyone who is struggling with carpal tunnel like me.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Smith the people who received this loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Truly disappointed. I expected better results based off the reviews. This provided minor support and allowed to much wrist movement.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.text: After reading through countless reviews. and comparing the different products found on Amazon, I thought I made the right choice purchasing this brace as it has countless 5 star reviews. However the product did not live up to its reviews.I was VERY disappointed when I finally got to try it.! Not only did it not help with my Wrist Pain. The quality of the product is not good at all. customer_reviews.author: Qinhan S.

I don't appreciate such tactics and it seemed full of those intentional spelling and grammar errors that social engineering scams rely on. I'm not sure what the end game is but this product has a 5 star rating with over 7000 reviews which is usually a red flag for me but I didn't notice at the time. customer_reviews.author: Brian S. James

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and they work. Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I got these braces almost two weeks ago and I'm very pleased with them. I purchased two orders since I need help for both my wrists. I'm not waking up with numbness in my hands anymore or cramps in my carpals. They're super comfortable. I really like the soft bean-bag like material for the palm so that you're not feeling the metal plate all night. It gets a little warm during sleep, but that's really my only minor complaint. I love them. They're a worthy investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used this while pregnant and got carpal tunnel. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm stuck with a useless wrist brace
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro attachment material at the palm started tearing after about 3 weeks of use. After about 5 weeks, it's impossible to secure the brace onto the palm. I should've returned the product before the 30-day return window closed. Now I'm stuck with a useless wrist brace.
customer_reviews.author: Ehren Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable...Exposed Steel Support Dug In To My Arm!!!
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a good product if the entire steel support strip was concealed in fabric, but it’s not. For some reason the last 3/4” of an inch is exposed and it irritates your skin because it’s at the bottom right where the most force on your arm is from your wrist trying to rotate. This product also made my wrist hurt really bad after a few minutes, but I’m not blaming that on the brace. That’s the reason I purchased the brace. Probably time to see a doctor and get it professionally diagnosed. If he suggests a brace similar to this, I’ll be purchasing a different one because this is poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I feel that is because it was nicely supported throughout the night
customer_reviews.text: I use it while I sleep. It did work wonders for me. When I woke my wrist and hand felt rested. I feel that is because it was nicely supported throughout the night. The brace itself is very comfortable to sleep with and does not get in the way of a good nights rest. I love the soft pillow like piece that is between your hand and the brace itself. It forms to the shape of your hand so it is very comfortable. It is also breathable. I did not wake with a sweaty sticky hand or wrist. Very nice product. I would recommend it to anyone who has any type of wrist pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: This Wrist Brace is Different (In a good way)!
customer_reviews.text: I love the detail that must have gone into making this design. It can fit on either hand, and the "Pillow" that stays in the palm of your hand is a great idea. I have slept with this on a few times, and it is washable! I am a caretaker for children and I occasionally hurt my wrist. This helps me sleep and keeps me from making it worse when i'm dreaming. Before I would use an ACE Wrist brace. It would get sweaty and smell bad. My skin was even lighter and sweaty (like a band-aid was on it) the next day. This Wrist Brace is different. The fabric is Breathable, Washable, and the design of it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sasafraz

customer_reviews.title: Kind of bulky - Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have small wrists and this is very bulky. It's just fine for night time though and it does seem to help. *UPDATE* As soon as I posted this review, the seller contacted me. Not only did they want to refund my money, but they wanted to buy me any brace I wanted available on Amazon.com. Now that is customer service right there. While this particular brace wasn't perfect for me, I would certainly buy something from this seller again.

The ONLY design flaw that exists is the hole to take the metal support bar out is ALWAYS open and the metal bar seemingly has a habit of slipping out and rubbing the end towards the elbow somewhat raw. It might be improved by integrating some velcro or snaps there; I'm planning on either stitching mine up or some other method of closing it up, other than that it's pretty perfect.

customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: It sure works instantly to help Carpal Tunnel problems
customer_reviews.text: The Comfy Brace is amazing. Using it the first night while sleeping, the next day my carpal tunnel problem was gone. I highly recommend this Comfy Brace.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable stopped my pain and numbness immediately
customer_reviews.text: For past 3 weeks I had left arm carpal tunnel symptoms of nighttime numbness and pain but ok or slight numbness during the day. I was sleeping less than 4 hours each night out of 9 hours in bed. I stopped my 5 times per week gym workouts and rested. I tried using ice, alieve, B vitamins, electric stim, but no improvements at all for 3 weeks. Brace arrived at 1 p.m. so I used it all day and kept it on all night. I had the first full night sleep in 3 weeks and woke up pain and numbness free. Now I will cancel my doctor appointment. Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bandomer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 popular types. This one is the best for sleeping out of the 2 I bought. Very comfortable and doesn’t get hot compared to my other one. I use a smaller kind for day time and this one at night. Very happy with it. Best results I’ve had for my carpal tunnel .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solution for hand numbness at night - prevents wrist movements affecting hand nerves
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months after purchasing before reviewing this brace. I have numbness in my hands when sleeping - related to nerves being pinched while sleeping - wrist bending etc. my mom had the same condition. She uses a doctor prescribed brace/wrap. I searched for something that would immobilize my wrist movements and this brace works awesome. It’s a super comfortable design to wear and I think it’s the small ‘bean bag’ in the palm area which keeps it snug. After 2+ months wearing I have no numbness and tingling in hand. If I don’t wear it the numbness returns every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES JUST WHAT IT SAYS
customer_reviews.text: This brace is not complicated. It can be used on either hand. It's easy to put on and take off.....and it works. It arrived to my home promptly. I received a nice note by the seller, saying he is grateful for my order and cares about my satisfaction, and to please contact him with any questions or concerns. What else can you want? (By the way, I gave 5 stars for range of motion, even though there is little because, isn't that sort of the point? It's such a delight to find a good product that I simply didn't want to rate any part of it less than five. Just know you won't be playing cards while wearing this.)
customer_reviews.author: Joyful1

customer_reviews.title: wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but cheap quality.

The beads are a nice touch, pretty comfortable except for the thumb hole area. I wear mine to sleep nightly and after a couple weeks noticed the seam splitting under the thumb. Eventually it kept splitting so much that the thumb hole went past the wrist, but I was able to sew it back together. I do like how it can be bn worn on either hand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Exposed metal brace scrapes skin! The brace isn't straight along the wrist!
customer_reviews.text: Immediately upon sliding onto my wrist, the exposed metal brace scraped my arm. The brace is also weirdly curved. It has beanbag filling in the wrist area for support, which leaves the metal brace coming out the bottom and SCRAPING my skin. The mfc didn't bother to smooth the edge of the brace that is exposed to skin, it's sharp. How do ppl like this and rate it 5 stars? I've never had a brace that was this poorly designed. I HATE this brace. Returned.

Purchase only if you enjoy the idea of landfills full of plastic polluting the earth, and are willing to pay every two months for new ones. Comfortable, but will not last long enough for your hands to improve.

customer_reviews.author: S-Gee

I am able to pull them on/off without using the Velcro. My hands are too small/fingers too short to type while they're on, but theoretically you could. I wish I would have done this years ago. I haven't washed them yet, so cannot comment on that.

customer_reviews.title: This brace relieves the pain and is very comfortable on either hand.

There is a little bean bag just under your fingers at the top of the brace. It cushions your fingers when they bend at night. I really like this feature. I recommend this brace for those of you who have carpal tunnel pain.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable wrist braces you will find for carpal tunnel syndrome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Comfy Braces because I suffer from Carpal Tunnel Syndrome and have a great deal of discomfort and numbness when I sleep. I have tried many other braces but they are always either uncomfortable or rub me wrong during the night making sleep difficult. Then I found the Comfy Brace! These braces are very comfortable and are cushioned to support your wrists without chafing. I use these braces while sleeping and they are the only ones I have found to do the trick. I simply cannot recommend them enough!

customer_reviews.text: Wrist brace great for median & ulnar nerve irritation relief. Hurricane Irma caused a lot of yard debris.. Use of chain saw, gas powered limb cutter irritated wrist nerve passages & caused swelling. Brace offered immobility & rest to allow swelling to reduce comfortably over time. Over use & vibration caused need for this brace & it worked, with ice & rest.
customer_reviews.author: cONSIDERATE cONSUMER

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many wrist braces for carpal tunnel relief and most are either too restrictive, have crappy Velcro, too tight, or the metal support digs into my hand. The material is nice and soft, and it adjusts easily while remaining secure throughout the night. After many unsuccessful treatments including surgery and cortisone injections, having an effective support brace is the only thing that prevents me from waking up every hour in pain. This one does the job.

Its sad that this only lasted about 2 months. Time to find a different brace, but it was good while it lasted though.

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with a damaged wrist

I was able to sleep and work on keyboard with and after a couple of weeks was able to progressively become less reliant on it. Great value and the metal rod built into (and the flexibility it provided) was great. I'd recommend this product and would be happy to be engaged directly for more feedback if anyone was interested

I won't be recommending it or buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Janine O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this! In fact... buy two!

Do yourself a favor and skip the cheaper uncomfortable braces and pickup one of these. In fact buy two, I would have LOVED to receive one of these as a gift.

I think the fit is a little big because I have to pull the velcro straps very far over and it makes the material bunch toward the top, but it doesn't affect the feel very much. Just the right amount of support. I just bought one for my left wrist!

My old worn out braces are a lot less comfortable but I can move my hands on the morning without pain. I wear them to sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Backhaus

customer_reviews.title: First night of decent sleep
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a brace that isn't working that well for sleep. After trying it, I'm glad I went with this one than other brands. I recommended it to my boss who has the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Firm comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these due to sudden carpal tunnel after Christmas. Too much hand strain. My carpal tunnel has not gone away but when I wear the Comfy Braces at night my hands feel much better when I get up in the morning. They are not for wearing during the day so I have not done that. Good work from a small business. I would recommend them for others who need night time relief.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: My arm felt better the second I put it on
customer_reviews.text: I almost felt like I just wasted 30 bucks on another bone wrapper that won't work, boy was I wrong. As soon as I put this brace on, the pain from my tendonitis eased up 10 fold....maybe 20 fold....I'm not real good measuring folds....whatever folds are. Anywho, this brace works, it fit my arm/wrist/hand very well and tries to stay out of the way. I can wear it longer because it is comfortable, so it probably does more good than most. Bottom line, good fit, good support and not too cumbersome, this brace does pretty much what it claims to do...I like that. Try it, you just may like it too!
customer_reviews.author: George of North Florida Woods

I had severe tendonitis and anyone who's had it knows you need to keep it stable for a long period Of time .... comfy brace allowed me to do just that..... thank you David for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: byfornow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable brace, great for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I needed something softer and more comfortable to protect my injured wrist while sleeping. Once I got the straps exactly how I want them, I can just slip the brace on and off as needed. Works well for pre-surgery injuries, post-surgery recovery, as well as permanent injuries or other discomforts.
customer_reviews.author: Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary wrist brace.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the comfybrace in February, I suffer from carpal tunnel in both hands and my Orthopaedic Hand surgeon recommended that I try a wrist brace for bedtime to avoid surgery. The comfybrace is made of durable material, which makes it very soft yet sturdy and my hands do not sweat. The super soft and comfortable cushioning beads by the palm were molded to the shape of my hand and hold my hand perfectly in that position. When I wake up in the morning now it the numbness seems to have diminish substantially since I have been warning the comfybrace. I would recommend the comfybrace to anyone who has carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Brads

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I was having wrist pain ( likely due to using a laptop for work at an odd angle). I've noticed a significant reduction in pain since using this! My only complaint - a minor one - is that there's a pouch filled with beads that seems like it shrinks over time. It still gives support along with the metal structure inside and doesn't feel too hot during all night wear. Overall giving a 5 star review because the contouring of the palm area and stability for the wrist has greatly increased my range of motion. Only noting because this may be a concern for another user.
customer_reviews.author: H&J Mads

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Brace is comfy to wear and helpful
customer_reviews.text: The Comfy Night Wrist Sleep Support Brace has been a welcome addition for me. My wife ordered a pair for me after I had been having some numbness in my fingers and a diagnosis of early carpal tunnel syndrome. The braces are reasonably priced, comfortable to wear and not intrusive for me at all. The creative design includes internal beads on the palm sides and three velcro closures that mold to the curves of my hands and provide solid wrist support. And you don't have to worry about which is which. Each brace is made to fit either hand comfortably and securely. I would encourage anyone seeking nighttime relief to give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: RTM

customer_reviews.title: I wear them every night now
customer_reviews.text: My hands kept falling asleep at night, waking me up, and making me worry about ongoing nerve damage. I thought the nerve was pinched higher up, near the shoulder, but decided to give these a try. Wearing them solved the issue pretty well. It's now happening only sporadically, maybe one every two weeks. If I don't wear them, it starts happening again. They are perfectly comfortable to wear all night if not tightened too much. Note that "range of motion" rating means they have little range of motion in the wrist, but you can still wiggle fingers, and e.g. operate a phone if you have to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update on my original review  :)
customer_reviews.text: well.... this is about customer service. customer_reviews.author: Shoe's Mom

customer_reviews.text: Have been sleeping in these every night for the last several weeks due to carpal tunnel in both wrists. Would highly recommend for anyone with carpal tunnel, looking for something that is comfortable enough to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Neil K.

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRACE ON THE MARKET!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from bilateral carpal tunnel. My arms become numb every time I lay in bed. This brace changed my life! I’ve finally been able to sleep thru the night without pain! customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.author: Lynn MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.author: Eli-jah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Effective, Nice Style

customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Helped my wrist
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wrist brace about three months ago, when intermittent pain and tingling in my right wrist became sufficiently frequent and bothersome as to interfere with my rest at night. After wearing it every night for a week and a half or thereabouts, my wrist symptoms were considerably improved. I have used it only occasionally since then, when I again begin to notice increases in tingling or discomfort. Each time it has alleviated my discomfort. It is easy to put on and feels supportive and comfortable. I have used it only at night; I imagine, but do not know, that it would take a while to get accustomed to doing daytime tasks while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: BethN

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Wrist Brace
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal tunnel syndrome and needed a wrist brace that would be comfortable enough to sleep in. This brace is excellent in that regard. It provides all the support a hard brace would, but is soft and comfortable. The brace is adjustable and can be used on either the right or left hand. Using this brace at night has helped ease my carpal tunnel issues and made for more comfortable days. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Helped Me Stay on Track w/Push-Ups and Other Training
customer_reviews.text: I started going through wrist fatigue symptoms, similar to a carpal tunnel feeling, several months back. Although my wrist wouldn't hurt during my workouts, and I usually wore wrist braces, I'd get uncomfortable sensations in my wrist later in the day. I ended up buying this, and although I didn't usually wear it to bed, I would wear it from the time I got home, until I did go to sleep. After a few weeks, I noticed the pain was less intense, and after a couple months, it was pretty much gone. I really think this helped not only take care of some of those pain symptoms, but it allowed me to stick with my training schedule. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Billy C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I did damage to the nerves in my fingertips from too many days of power washing. My doctor told me to purchase any brace made for carpal tunnel syndrome and wear them nightly. customer_reviews.author: Missy

It’s very adjustable. Only minor complaint is it’s hard to work with (I can’t use my hand much with it) but that may be more due to my injury than the brace. Also, it leaves a minor stain on my wrist where it’s tightest, but it comes off as soon as I wash my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Currid

customer_reviews.title: Best wrists guards I used for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering with medial and lateral epicondylitis in both arms for two years before I finally exhausted all the conservative options and finally got cortisone shots in my elbows. I highly recommend them, as they are very comfortable, well made, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: DancerJack
